title: Magnitude of net force from position function

content.prompt: A 5.0 kg object suspended on a spring oscillates such that its position x as a function of time t is given by the equation x (t ) = A cos(ωt ), where A = 0.80 m and ω = 2.0 s-1 . What is the magnitude of the maximum net force on the object during the motion?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
